hadith.text: Al-Aswad reported that 'A'isha said:You have made us equal to the dogs and the asses, whereas I lay on the bedstead and the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) came there and stood in the middle of the bedstead and said prayer. I did not like to take off the quilt from me (in that state), so I moved away quietly from the front legs of the bedstead and thus came out of the quilt
